name: Cybarian: The Time Travelling Warrior
description: Cybarian The Time Travelling Warrior is a classically inspired arcade action game, with a mixture of modern and retro gaming tropes.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Pentium(R) Dual-Core E 5200 2.50GHz or better Memory: 2 GB RAM
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-5287U Processor Memory: 2 GB RAM
